itemListElement.name: Meet the MVPS – Hosted by Monica, Eric and Misty

@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Meet the MVPs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Get acquainted with 5 amazing Salesforce MVPs who will share their secrets to success

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Highlights from MVPs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce MVPs, AI enthusiasts, futurists, and sceptics uncover what’s next for Salesforce across Sales, Service, Marketing, and IT. Featuring Leyna Hoffer, Shivanath Devinarayanan, Meighan Brodkey, Mohith Shrivastava, Rakesh Gupta, Jean Michel Mougeolle, Amit Chaudhary, Jan Vandevelde, Atul Gupta, Fabrice Cathala, Eric Dreshfield.

jetpack-related-posts.title: How Flow Can Help You Become a Developer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Using Flow to Become a Developer North Africa DreaminOctober 19, 2019 <!-- --> North Africa Dreamin Why Participate? During this event, developers, administrators, business users and Salesforce partners will gather to train and share their knowledge and expertise. It will also be an opportunity for members to get to know…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Panaya: Best Practices for Maintaining Healthy Salesforce Architecture
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: May 5 webinar with Guillermo Pedroni and myself tried and true best practices for maintaining healthy Salesforce Architecture. With tips on planning security, keeping your design simple – from the start, data cleanup & mapping and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Admin & Dev Recap
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join us as 3 Salesforce MVP‘s, Eric Dreshfield, Mike Martin, and Meighan Brodkey, bring Dreamforce ‘19 to you. Our Dreamforce19 recap panel will answer the questions you want to know about the best admin/dev sessions, favorite tips and takeaways and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: My Top Salesforce Books
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Must have books in your collection as an Architect on the Force.com Platform. Major Props to the Authors - Tameem Bahri, James Hutcherson, Ahsan Zafa, Mike King, Andy Fawcett and by Eric Freeman & Elisabeth Robson for creating my top 5. https://www.amazon.com/Becoming-Salesforce-Certified-Technical-Architect-ebook/dp/B08NXV3H15/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-1 https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Data-Architecture-Management-effectively/dp/1801073244/ref=sr_1_3_sspa?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-3-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzRDY0Mk9SWENLSE1GJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMzU1ODU1WEY4MzlYSTRaVVhPJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAyMzg4NzQxRUxTTUFUVk1VREZPJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Architects-Handbook-End-End-ebook/dp/B08TLJYTSZ/ref=sr_1_2_sspa?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-2-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzRDY0Mk9SWENLSE1GJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMzU1ODU1WEY4MzlYSTRaVVhPJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAwMTU1MTYzNVNYRENONDJUM0lDJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Solution-Architects-business-consumer-ebook/dp/B09BZY4G4B/ref=sr_1_8?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-8 https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Lightning-Platform-Enterprise-Architecture-ebook/dp/B07SYJBV7P/ref=sr_1_7?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-7 https://www.amazon.com/dp/149207800X/ref=redir_mobile_desktop?_encoding=UTF8&aaxitk=68b51899314bf7e95d9c6163e5917f86&hsa_cr_id=3731486690201&pd_rd_plhdr=t&pd_rd_r=074aec07-6e18-4ad6-8573-aade53769f14&pd_rd_w=ncCU5&pd_rd_wg=bnsNa&ref_=sbx_be_s_sparkle_mcd_asin_0_img
